scripts.transform: npm run build && node dist/index.js transform -i ./mermaid.md -o ../output/yml -n Company.VTC
scripts.generate:code: npm run build && node dist/index.js generate -i ../output/yml -o ../output/code --templates "../Templates/C#"
scripts.generate:docs: npm run build && node dist/index.js generate -i ../output/yml -o ../output/docs --templates "../Templates/Documentation"
scripts.watch: npm run build && node dist/index.js watch -m ./ -y "../output/yml" -o "../output/code" --templates "../Templates/C#" -n Company.VTC
